description: Creates a new generic pipe definition in the given or default project.
title: Angular Pipe Options Schema

___skipTests.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test files for the new pipe.

___name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the pipe?

___lintFix.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the pipe.

___spec.description: When true (the default), generates a  "spec.ts" test file for the new pipe.

___skipImport.description: When true, does not import this pipe into the owning NgModule.

___export.description: When true, the declaring NgModule exports this pipe.

___flat.description: When true (the default) creates files at the top level of the project.

___path.description: The path at which to create the pipe, relative to the workspace root.
